0.02.text: You can't connect the dots looking forward,

2.07.text: you can only connect them looking backwards.

6.28.text: So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future.

10.52.text: You have to trust in something:

12.13.text: your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever.

15.75.text: Because believing that the dots will connect down the road

19.07.text: will give you the confidence to follow your heart,

21.29.text: even when it leads you off the well worn path.

24.53.text: And that will make all the diffrence.

30.27.text: so don't waste it living someone else's life.

36.18.text: which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

39.23.text: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.

44.38.text: You've got to find what you love.

46.36.text: And that is as true for your work as it is for your lovers.

50.43.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life

53.08.text: and the only way to be truly satisfied

55.07.text: is to do what you believe is great work.

57.16.text: And the only way to do great work...

60.26.text: is to love what you do

63.04.text: If you haven't found it yet,

72.19.text: what you truly want to become.

76.12.text: You’re going to have some ups and you’re going to have some downs

82.04.text: Most people give up on themselves easily.

84.11.text: You know the human spirit is powerful?

87.10.text: There is nothing as powerful – it’s hard to kill the human spirit!

92.14.text: Anybody can feel good when they have their health, their bills are paid, they have happy relationships.

96.36.text: Anybody can have a larger vision then,

98.25.text: Anybody can have a large vision then,

99.70.text: anybody can have faith under those kinds of circumstances.

120.72.text: Part of being hungry when you have been defeated.

144.67.text: Fear... put people in the hospital.

149.51.text: can hold you back from doing something that you know within yourself that you are capable of doing,

163.22.text: At the end of your feelings is nothing,

167.00.text: but at the end of every principle is a promise.

170.07.text: Behind your little feelings, it might not be absolutely nothing at the end of your little feelings.

174.13.text: But behind every principle is a promise.

177.58.text: And some of you in your life

179.08.text: the reason why you not at your goal right now, because you just all about your feelings.

184.10.text: All on your feelings, you don’t feel like waking up – who does?

189.26.text: Everyday you say 'no' to your dreams,

192.03.text: you might be pushing your dreams back a whole six months, a whole year!

195.15.text: That one single day, that one day you didn’t get up could have pushed your stuff back I don’t know how long.

204.26.text: Don't allow your emotion to control you.

212.01.text: If you don't discipline and contain your emotion, they will use you.

224.26.text: and you’re going to go all out to have it.

227.11.text: It’s not going to be easy, when you want to change,

230.09.text: it’s not easy. If it were in fact easy, everybody would do it.

233.25.text: But if you’re serious, you’ll go all out.

243.15.text: I’m not going to let this get me down, I’m not going to let this destroy me.

250.24.text: And I'll be stronger and better because of it!

256.12.text: That this is what you stand for!

263.04.text: Take full responsibility for your life.

266.17.text: Accept where you are and the responsibility that you’re going to take yourself where you want to go.

274.23.text: You can decide that I am going to live each day as if it were my last!

287.10.text: Decided that you are going to push yourself.

290.07.text: The last chapter to your life has not been written yet,

293.13.text: and it doesn’t matter about what happened yesterday

296.08.text: It doesn’t matter about what happened to you, what matters is:

298.24.text: ‘what are you going to do about it?’

304.28.text: This year I will make this goal become a reality.

308.01.text: I won’t talk about it anymore.

335.42.text: To persevere I think is important for everybody.

339.52.text: Don't give up, don't give in.

342.02.text: There's always an answer to everything
